attributes.action: The goverment should be more like Winston Churchill who would be ashamed of the goverment dealing with  the current situations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am going to start my own political party to rid this country of the traitors who exploit their expenses and paid bonuses to people who have run this country to the ground (boom or bust never to be seen again), asylum seekers claiming benefits who actually get paid more than old age pensioners, who fought for our rights to freedom and they are treated in such a poor manner. We are looking forward to May when the people of UK vote

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
